body_html:
can we please figure out a way to move the onnx tests out to pytorch-onnx? It's really annoying that every update in the upstream repo (which happens fairly frequently) requires us to change 500 lines of expect files. Let's keep a single tiny test to make sure it doesn't break terribly, but test all other ops there

It's on the todo list.
